mapper.sql: id, orderId, hsId, otherPartyId,quantity,name, amount, tsc, tsu
mapper.select:
select
from hs_same_fee where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT} and deleted = 0

select
from hs_same_fee where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT} and deleted = 1
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM hs_same_fee WHERE id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT} and deleted =0
mapper.update: UPDATE hs_same_fee SET deleted = 1, tsu = current_timestamp WHERE id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT} and deleted=0
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO hs_same_fee ( id, orderId, hsId, otherPartyId, quantity, name, amount, tsc ) VALUES ( #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{orderId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{hsId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{otherPartyId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{quantity,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{amount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{tsc,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} )

insert into hs_same_fee
id, orderId, hsId, name, otherPartyId, quantity, amount, tsc,

mapper.update: UPDATE hs_same_fee SET orderId = #{orderId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, hsId = #{hsId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, amount = #{amount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, otherPartyId= #{otherPartyId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, quantity = #{quantity,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, tsc = #{tsc,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, tsu = current_timestamp WHERE id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
